name: Citizens Financial Services, Inc.
description: Citizens Financial Services, Inc. is a financial holding company that provides a wide range of banking and financial services through its subsidiary, Citizens & Northern Bank. Founded in 1864 and headquartered in Wellsboro, Pennsylvania, the company serves individuals, businesses, and municipalities primarily in Pennsylvania and New York. Citizens Financial offers a comprehensive suite of services, including personal and business banking, mortgages, investment management, and insurance products. The bank is committed to community involvement and aims to deliver exceptional customer service while fostering long-term relationships with its clients. Citizens Financial is dedicated to leveraging technology to enhance banking experiences and streamline operations. Through a focus on sustainable practices and local engagement, the company strives to contribute positively to the communities it serves. As a community bank, Citizens Financial places a strong emphasis on understanding the unique needs of its customers and providing tailored financial solutions to meet those needs. With a robust branch network and digital banking capabilities, Citizens Financial is well-positioned to navigate the evolving financial landscape while maintaining its commitment to local communities.

seo.meta_title: Citizens Financial Services, Inc. | Community Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Citizens Financial Services, Inc., a community bank dedicated to providing personalized financial solutions. Discover our range of banking, investment, and insurance services.

faq.question: What services does Citizens Financial offer?
faq.answer: Citizens Financial offers personal banking, business banking, investment services, and insurance products.

faq.question: Where is Citizens Financial headquartered?
faq.answer: Citizens Financial is headquartered in Wellsboro, Pennsylvania, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Citizens Financial?
faq.answer: Joseph M. Moser is the CEO of Citizens Financial Services, Inc.
